metadata.dc:title: La interrupción precoz del tratamiento triple con telaprevir de la hepatitis crónica C por efecto adverso grave no presupone necesariamente el fracaso del tratamiento.
[Early interruption of triple therapy with telaprevir in chronic hepatitis C due to severe adverse effects does not necessarily lead to treatment failure].
